data.actual_result: Discord receives no audio from device until format is set to "CD Quality"
data.expected_result: Discord should be able to receive audio from the device regardless of format.
data.short_description: Audio options do not update without a restart.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open discord with audio device attached - with audio device is set to anything other than 16bit/44.1KHz you can see audio on the input device, but Discord will not receive audio - open windows "Sound" control panel. - go to "Recording" tab - right click on audio device and select "Properties" - click on "Advanced" tab. - Change "Default Format" drop down to "16bit/44.1KHz (CD Quality)" - Discord will now receive audio from the input device.
